summary: Duran Duran is an English rock band formed in 1978. They became famous in the 1980s for their music videos and hits like "Girls on Film" and "Rio." The band's popularity was huge, often compared to the Beatles. They had many successful albums and singles, but some members left and rejoined over the years. Duran Duran has sold over 100 million records and won many awards, including a Grammy and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. They were inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 2022.
title: Duran Duran
